body:
We got rid of `master` after #17377, but users still want a way to get the latest stable release without knowing its number.

We've added a `releases/latest` tag to replace what was once the `master` branch. Note that unlike `master` in Git Flow, `releases/latest` is a tag, not a branch. It's just a pointer to the latest release.

cc: @bradcray @ankingcodes.
title: releases: document `releases/latest` tag
